synopses.synopsis: Favorite Story was a nationally syndicated outgrowth of a local dramatic offering, developed and continued on KFI, Los Angeles. The fare was classic literature, both the novel and short story... - On the Air: The Encyclopedia of Old-Time Radio by John Dunning
